name: Rocket Park
description:
You may see this kind of stuff  in many platforms  but this one is unique for me .exactly !this one is my first  game dev, if you find any bugs or anything need to be improved ? Don’t  be hesitate feel free to share your  thoughts. Thank-you  

CREDITS

Cartoon drawing(Poster) : Hari 

Sound support : seven media

Game music programmer : Dharanee

Sound design: @ seven media

CONTROLS 

➖Space bar  : Thrusting Rocket 

⬅️➡️Left and Right arrow : To move left and right 

⬇️ arrow :  To thrust down 

Escape key : Back to menu 

GAME CHEATS 

* Click "L" to skip the level

* Click "C" to avoid collision between the obstacles
